summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3805 for the improvement of 3rd Avenue North, from a connection with the existing pavement on Bigelow Avenue North to Galer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46847, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
